mapper.sql: a.id as id ,a.yuangong_id as yuangongId ,a.kehu_uuid_number as kehuUuidNumber ,a.kehu_name as kehuName ,a.kehu_phone as kehuPhone ,a.kehu_id_number as kehuIdNumber ,a.kehu_photo as kehuPhoto ,a.sex_types as sexTypes ,a.kehu_email as kehuEmail ,a.kehu_address as kehuAddress ,a.hangye_types as hangyeTypes ,a.zhiwei_types as zhiweiTypes ,a.diqu_types as diquTypes ,a.create_time as createTime
mapper.select:
SELECT
,yuangong.yuangong_uuid_number as yuangongUuidNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_name as yuangongName ,yuangong.yuangong_phone as yuangongPhone ,yuangong.yuangong_id_number as yuangongIdNumber ,yuangong.yuangong_photo as yuangongPhoto ,yuangong.yuangong_email as yuangongEmail ,yuangong.jinyong_types as jinyongTypes
FROM kehu a left JOIN yuangong yuangong ON a.yuangong_id = yuangong.id
and a.id in
#{item}
and ( a.yuangong_id = #{params.yuangongId} )
and a.kehu_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuUuidNumber},'%')
and a.kehu_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuName},'%')
and a.kehu_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuPhone},'%')
and a.kehu_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuIdNumber},'%')
and a.sex_types = #{params.sexTypes}
and a.kehu_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuEmail},'%')
and a.kehu_address like CONCAT('%',#{params.kehuAddress},'%')
and a.hangye_types = #{params.hangyeTypes}
and a.zhiwei_types = #{params.zhiweiTypes}
and a.diqu_types = #{params.diquTypes}
and a.yuangong_id IS NOT NULL
and yuangong.yuangong_uuid_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongUuidNumber},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_name like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongName},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_phone like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongPhone},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_id_number like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongIdNumber},'%')
and yuangong.yuangong_email like CONCAT('%',#{params.yuangongEmail},'%')
and yuangong.jinyong_types = #{params.jinyongTypes}
order by a.${params.sort} ${params.order}
